attributes.action: Make it illegal for airlines to inflate prices around school holidays.
attributes.additional_details:
Set a standard pricing throughout the year.
Allow discounts "sales" for quieter periods, but limit these to 2 weeks maximum.

For eg London to Paris £100 every day of the year.  Jan 4th - 18th 25% discount
Return journeys to be charged the same.
attributes.background:
All British Airlines should be made to conform to a Standard pricing like buses.
They should be allowed to do sales, but these should be.limited to maximum TWICE a year, for 2 weeks.This will stop them from falsely setting a highly inflated price and discounting all except school holiday

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban holiday companies raising prices in school holidays.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700540
